lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump was filmed talking to Billy Bush of “Access Hollywood” on the set of “Days of Our Lives” in 2005 when Mr. Trump repeatedly made vulgar remarks about women.

headline.main: Transcript: Donald Trump’s Taped Comments About Women
